We ate at La Pepita for dinner out first night in Barcelona... in part because of the great reviews we saw on Yelp.The tapas were great.  My friend and I shared 4 of them.  Our favorite was an Argentinian Beef... but they were all good.Our waiter suggested that we get 3-4 tapas and then each get one Pepita (sandwich type thing)  My Pepita had serano ham and cheese and a few other things on it.  It was just ok.If i were to go back I'd just get tapas.  OVerall it was a good meal, but not our favorite!
